Giving to the School’s Annual Fund is an investment in tomorrow’s public health heroes

Over the last four years, Annual Fund contributions have allowed us to offer scholarships to students in each of the School’s departments — a total of 69 Annual Fund Scholars to date.

In fall 2013, thanks to the generosity of alumni and friends who give to the Fund, we provided scholarships to 11 students.

An investment in these young scholars is an investment in public health progress — in our state, across the U.S. and around the world, wherever they work and serve. Please join us in supporting in the next generation of public health heroes.

For more information about Annual Fund Scholarships or to make a gift, visit sph.unc.edu/annualfund or contact Deanna Wilkie at dwilkie@unc.edu or 919.966.0198.
